text: because when girls are given the right
tools to succeed they can create
incredible futures everyone should be
afforded the opportunity to receive
education that they want but more
importantly the education that they have
the right to receive and for women and
girls in developing countries this is
vital providing them with access to
education is the key to economic and
social development
because when girls are given the right
tools to succeed they can create
incredible futures not only for
themselves but for all of those around
them hearing her speak not only empowers
a lot of young women but it's also a
sign of of change you know women are
taking lead roles in something I mean
the Her Majesty the Queen is a huge
leadership example when we talk about
women in leadership it doesn't get
higher than that she also noted that we
had a male representative and this is
the women and power empowerment group as
she told us to encourage other males to
also champion the cause in the sense
that it is not only a woman's fight it
is not a fight at all we are all in this
together
